channel.title: Medium Laura Evans' Podcast
channel.description: Teaching spiritual awareness, one podcast at a time.

channel.itunes:summary: Teaching spiritual awareness, one podcast at a time.

item.title: Guest Podcast with author/intuitive Jamie Roth

item.title: Advanced Guide meditation
item.description: This meditation is for those who have met a guide or guides and are at a loss on what to ask of them. There is a short introduction to the podcast and then a 30 minute meditation. Request by Nathope :)
item.dc:creator: Medium Laura Evans
item.itunes:summary:
This meditation is for those who have met a guide or guides and are at a loss on what to ask of them. There is a short introduction to the podcast and then a 30 minute meditation.
Request by Nathope :)

item.description: A comfortable relaxing meditation to help you connect to loved ones and spirit friends.

item.title: Episode 2 - Ways we can connect
item.description: This podcast explains different ways to use to connect to your spirit guides and angels. [img:http://www.podcast.tv/images/sticker_podcast_tv.gif] [http://www.podcast.tv/?feed=197536]

item.title: Episode 3 - Runner Guides
item.description: Episode 3 - Today I will explain the importance of our guides and the roles they play. Runner guides - our invisible helpers. Next week, Joy Guides - that make us laugh
item.dc:creator: Medium Laura Evans
item.itunes:summary:
Episode 3 - Today I will explain the importance of our guides and the roles they play. Runner guides - our invisible helpers.
Next week, Joy Guides - that make us laugh

item.title: Episode 4 - Joys and Helper Guides
item.description: This is part 4 of my podcasts on guides. What are joy guides how do they work in our lives? Is there a way to call on our helper guides when we need advice or information? This podcast distributes on Mondays
item.dc:creator: Medium Laura Evans
item.itunes:summary:
This is part 4 of my podcasts on guides. What are joy guides how do they work in our lives? Is there a way to call on our helper guides when we need advice or information?
This podcast distributes on Mondays

item.title: Episode 5 - Animal totems and Angel guides
item.description: This week we will go over some basic understanding of how animals and angels serve to protect and guide us on earth.
item.dc:creator: Medium Laura Evans
item.itunes:summary: This week we will go over some basic understanding of how animals and angels serve to protect and guide us on earth.

item.title: Episode 6 - negative entities with Tammie Bowden
item.description: Discussing some ways that we can "pick up" spirit attachments. Tammie Bowden provides some enlightening information. Tammie's websites http://soul-light-journeys.heim.at/ http://www.freewebs.com/darkmoonpsychics/index.htm http://upsandownstours.webs.com

item.description: In this podcast, I will teach you techniques to access your past lives through your dreams.

item.title: Games we play - with our guides

item.itunes:summary: This podcast teaches you with simple playing cards, how to establish a better working communication with your guides.

item.title: Episode 11 - Authentic Power
item.description: Do you get angry, jealous, sad and fearful? Would you like to know how to control these emotions? Listen in!
item.dc:creator: Medium Laura Evans
item.itunes:summary: Do you get angry, jealous, sad and fearful? Would you like to know how to control these emotions? Listen in!

item.title: Episode 12 Auras with Solana
item.description: The colors, what are they? Would you like to learn to see auras?? My guest and friend Solana has made a wonderful podcast to share with you! Thank You!

item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Episode 13 - Forgiving
item.description: This podcast is about forgiving yourself and forgiving those that have hurt, abused or neglected you. There is a short meditation afterwards, please do not listen to the meditation while you are driving or doing anything that needs your full attention
item.dc:creator: Medium Laura Evans
item.itunes:summary: This podcast is about forgiving yourself and forgiving those that have hurt, abused or neglected you. There is a short meditation afterwards, please do not listen to the meditation while you are driving or doing anything that needs your full attention

item.title: Episode 14 - guides and imagination
item.description: Here I will explain how "imagining" fits into our guides messages as well as a short meditation to help you release some self doubt about what you are receiving from your spirit friends.
item.dc:creator: Medium Laura Evans
item.itunes:summary: Here I will explain how "imagining" fits into our guides messages as well as a short meditation to help you release some self doubt about what you are receiving from your spirit friends.
